title: Blending Relaxation & Sophistication to Create the Ideal Place
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 914 Sq.
Stylish apartment living for both the start-up and the start-something-new crowds, the Main Street Cupertino Lofts offers a unique and fresh way to Simplify Your Life.
At the Main Street Cupertino Lofts, a community of studio and one bedroom apartments, you'll enjoy purpose-built and ironically styled apartments befitting of the tech-friendly area.
In addition to the ample amenities and trending conveniences throughout, you'll take advantage of immediate access to shopping and dining.

Built in dishwashers, Stainless Steel Appliances, Live-Work Lofts, High End Finishes, Hardwood Style Flooring, Patio or Balcony*, Quartz Countertops, Modern Kitchens with Jenn-Air appliances/gas stoves, Walk-in closets*, Washers and Dryers in every unit, Vaulted ceilings with floor to ceiling windows*

Coffee Wi-Fi Lounge, Wine Lockers, Package Concierge, Dry Cleaning Service, Two levels of underground parking with electric car chargers, On-Site Retail, Fitness Center, Walkable Town-Square Community, Bike Lockers, Outdoor Terrace + Grill, Club Room, Lush Social Courtyards, On-Site Management
Pet Friendly (Some breed and weight restrictions apply)
